name: Bitsy Trail Mix
description:
You are an adventurer who got himself stuck in a dungeon. You must escape and claim the treasure!

You must use your memory, wits, and and determination to overcome the 4 trials that await you...

Controls:

Use Arrow keys to move. You can interact with other objects/beings by moving towards them.

Press Z to continue dialog. 

(if music does not play, check the outside window for a toggle ON/OFF option.)

Credits:

Game Design: Jan Iglesias, Jean Paul Salman & Manuel Govea

Code: Jan Iglesias & Manuel Govea
